sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for counting microbial colonies using a colony counter.
sections.scope: Applicable to enumeration of microbial colonies in the Microbiology laboratory.
procedure: Place the culture plate on the counting platform.
Adjust illumination for clear visibility of colonies.
Mark and count colonies using the counting probe.
Remove the culture plate after counting.
Switch OFF the instrument after use.
sections.precautions: Handle culture plates carefully. Avoid contamination during counting.
